column4: what distro do you guys suggest for a Pentium MMX 199Mhz with 96Mb Ram ? It currently has a Debian fresh install
all distros will work the same, you probably want a light gui such as blackbox
I was thinking about fluxbox which I'ma lready used or maybe try ratpoison which as intrigued me for a long time
any of those will work just fine. Just don't try using gnome or kde since it will make the machine a bit slow
